skins.name: Trizek Sticker
skins.author: XayUp
skins.description: This skin was inspired by the model made by Trizek to have an experience as close as possible to this beautiful skin, with support for Unipad and MultiPad.

skins.name: Mk3 Skin
skins.author: XayUp
skins.description: A skin based on Novation's Launchpad X MK3 model. Made with all the care and detail to have an experience closer to Launchpad. Compatible with Unipad and MultiPad.
